parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.5</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListBox </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Selects the item with the given index in the listbox, listnbox, combobox, xcombobox, xlistbox<br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Important </title><part><name index="1"/><value> '''The following only applicable to Alternative Syntax when used with [[CT_LISTBOX]] and [[CT_LISTNBOX]]'''<br>To deselect all entries, use -1: <tt>_ctrl [[lbSetCurSel]] -1;</tt> For listbox of style LB_MULTI use [[lbSetSelected]] instead.<br>[[CT_COMBO]] does not allow unselecting entries, instead it will select the first one. If you really need to unselect a combobox then follow these steps:<br>
# Are you really really sure you want to unselect a combobox? This behavior is inconsistent with the usual functionality of a combobox.
# Read the note from [[User:DreadedEntity|DreadedEntity]] below.</value></part></template></value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lbSetCurSel''' [idc, index] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, index]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] of control </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''lbSetCurSel''' index </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER32</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lbSetCurSel]] [101, 0];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
		  
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_control [[lbSetCurSel]] 0;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[lbAdd]], [[lbClear]], [[lbColor]], [[lbCurSel]], [[lbData]], [[lbDelete]], [[lbIsSelected]], [[lbPicture]], [[lbSelection]], [[lbSetColor]], [[lbSetData]], [[lbSetPicture]], [[lbSetSelected]], [[lbSetTooltip]], [[lbSetValue]], [[lbSize]], [[lbSort]], [[lbSortByValue]], [[lbText]], [[lbValue]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on November 29, 2014 - 23:40 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:DreadedEntity|DreadedEntity]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
'''Prior to ArmA 1.90''' lbSetCurSel -1 had no effect while the listbox was populated. You needed to use [[lbClear]] first, then lbSetCurSel -1, then re-populate the listbox.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes -->
</comment>
<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on March 1, 2015 - 18:37 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Longbow|Longbow]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Keep in mind that running this command against control will fire attached 'onLBSelChanged' event handler.
</dd>
</dl>
